name: Nothing to Wear
description:
You are Daphne Ellison, a fashion lover, fashion influencer, and frequent thrifter. You have amassed a huge collection of clothing and shoes—so much you hardly have space for it. But when you are invited to a business lunch with the editor of a popular fashion magazine who may want to offer your own style column, you just cannot find anything suitable to wear! You know you need the perfect piece to wow the editor and secure your dream job, and nothing you have will work. You know you must embark on a quest to find the outfit that will set you apart. Armed with ample determination and a list of your favorite thrift stores, you begin your mission.

Use the arrow keys to guide Daphne through her closet and then three levels of thrift-store mazes. Avoid your adoring fans who will distract you from your goals and beat rival shoppers to the items you need to impress Vignetta Pascal.
